GE07bhagvg_u:2: dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca dharmakṣetre kurukṣetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata sañjaya 1.1
GE07bhagvg_u:3: sañjaya uvāca dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā ācāryam upasaṅgamya rājā vacanam abravīt 1.2
GE07bhagvg_u:4: paśyaitāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām ācārya mahatīṃ camūm vyūḍhāṃ drupadaputreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā 1.3
GE07bhagvg_u:5: atra śūrā maheṣvāsā bhīmārjunasamā yudhi yuyudhāno virāṭaśca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ 1.4
GE07bhagvg_u:6: dhṛṣṭaketuś cekitānaḥ kāśirājaś ca vīryavān purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṅgavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:7: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:8: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te 1.7
GE07bhagvg_u:9: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiñjayaḥ aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saumadattis tathaiva ca 1.8
GE07bhagvg_u:10: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ nānāśastrapraharaṇāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ 1.9
GE07bhagvg_u:11: aparyāptaṃ tad asmākaṃ balaṃ bhīṣmābhirakṣitam paryāptaṃ tvidam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi 1.11
GE07bhagvg_u:12: tasya sañjanayan harṣaṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ siṃhanādaṃ vinadyocchaiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
GE07bhagvg_u:13: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ sahasaivābhyahanyanta sa śabdas tumulobhavat
GE07bhagvg_u:14: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradaghmatuḥ 1.14
GE07bhagvg_u:15: pāñcajanyaṃ hṛṣīkeśo devadattaṃ dhanañjayaḥ pauṇḍraṃ dadhmau mahāśaṅkhaṃ bhīmakarmā vṛkodaraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:16: anañtavijayaṃ rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sughoṣamaṇipuṣpakau 1.16
GE07bhagvg_u:17: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:18: drupado draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ pṛthivīpate saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthakpṛthak
GE07bhagvg_u:19: sa ghoṣo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni vyadārayat nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulobhyanunādayan
GE07bhagvg_u:20: atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān.h kapidhvajaḥ pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte dhanur udyamya
GE07bhagvg_u:21: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya mecyuta
GE07bhagvg_u:22: yāvad etān nirikṣehaṃ yoddhukāmān avasthitān kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame
GE07bhagvg_u:23: yotsyamānān avekṣehaṃ ya etetra samāgatāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrasya durbuddher yuddhe priyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:24: evam ukto hṛṣīkeśo guḍākeśena bhārata senayor ubhayor madhye sthāpayitvā rathottamam 1.24
GE07bhagvg_u:25: bhīṣmadroṇapramukhataḥ sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitām uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti 1.25
GE07bhagvg_u:26: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṛn atha pitāmahān ācāryān mātulān bhrātṛn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā 1.26
GE07bhagvg_u:27: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān
GE07bhagvg_u:28: kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo viṣīdann idamabravīt dṛṣṭvemaṃ svajanaṃ kṛṣṇa yuyutsuṃ samupasthitam
GE07bhagvg_u:29: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhañ ca pariśuṣyati vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate 1.29
GE07bhagvg_u:30: gāṇḍīvaṃ straṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ 1.30
GE07bhagvg_u:31: nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava na ca śreyonupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave 1.31
GE07bhagvg_u:32: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā 1.32
GE07bhagvg_u:33: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca ta imevasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni
GE07bhagvg_u:34: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ śyālāḥ sambandhinas
GE07bhagvg_u:35: etān na hantum icchhāmi ghnatopi madhusūdana api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte 1.35
GE07bhagvg_u:36: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syājanārdana pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:37: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān svabāndhavān svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava 1.37
GE07bhagvg_u:38: yadyapyete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mitradrohe ca pātakam 1.38
GE07bhagvg_u:39: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir janārdana
GE07bhagvg_u:40: kulakṣaye praṇaśyanti kuladharmāḥ sanātanāḥ dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmobhibhavaty uta
GE07bhagvg_u:41: adharmābhibhavāt kṛṣṇa praduṣyanti kulastriyaḥ strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇasaṅkaraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:42: saṅkaro narakāyaiva kulaghnānāṃ kulasya ca patanti pitaro hy eṣāṃ luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ 1.42
GE07bhagvg_u:43: doṣair etaiḥ kulaghnānāṃ varṇasaṅkarakārakaiḥ utsādyante jātidharmāḥ kuladharmāś ca śāśvatāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:44: utsannakuladharmāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ janārdana narake niyataṃ vāso bhavatīty anuśuśruma 1.44
GE07bhagvg_u:45: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam yad rājyasukhalobhena hantuṃ svajanam udyatāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:46: yadi mām apratīkāram aśastraṃ śastrapāṇayaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet
GE07bhagvg_u:47: evam uktvārjunaḥ saṅkhye rathopastha upāviśat visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ śokasaṃvignamānasaḥ 1.47
GE07bhagvg_u:49: sañjaya uvāca taṃ tathā kṛpayāviṣṭam aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇam viṣīdantam idaṃ vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:50: śrībhagavān uvāca kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam anāryajuṣṭam asvargyam akīrtikaram arjuna 2.2
GE07bhagvg_u:51: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate kṣudraṃ hṛdayadaurbalyaṃ tyaktvottiṣṭha
GE07bhagvg_u:52: arjuna uvāca kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ sāṅkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjārhāv arisūdana 2.4
GE07bhagvg_u:53: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvān śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣyam apīha loke hatvārthakāmāṃstu gurunihaiva bhuñjjīya bhogān rudhirapradigdhān 2.5
GE07bhagvg_u:54: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas tevasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ 2.6
GE07bhagvg_u:55: kārpaṇyadoṣopahatasvabhāvaḥ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dharmasaṃmūḍhacetāḥ yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me śiṣyastehaṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam 2.7
GE07bhagvg_u:56: na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam 2.8
GE07bhagvg_u:57: sañjaya uvāca evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ paraṃtapaḥ na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha 2.9
GE07bhagvg_u:58: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ 2.10
GE07bhagvg_u:59: śrībhagavān uvāca aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase gatāsūn agatāsūṃś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ 2.11
GE07bhagvg_u:60: natv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param dehinosmin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati
GE07bhagvg_u:61: mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ āgamāpāyinonityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata 2.14
GE07bhagvg_u:62: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha samaduḥkhasukhaṃ dhīraṃ somṛtatvāya kalpate
GE07bhagvg_u:63: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ubhayor api dṛṣṭo.antas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:64: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati
GE07bhagvg_u:65: antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ anāśinoprameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata 2.18
GE07bhagvg_u:66: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate
GE07bhagvg_u:67: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ ajo nityaḥ śāśvatoyaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre 2.20
GE07bhagvg_u:68: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naroparāṇi tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī 2.20
GE07bhagvg_u:69: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:70: acchedyoyam adāhyoyam akledyośoṣya eva ca nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acaloyaṃ sanātanaḥ 2.24
GE07bhagvg_u:71: avyaktoyam acintyoyam avikaryoyam ucyate tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhasi 2.25
GE07bhagvg_u:72: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07bhagvg_u:73: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca tasmād aparihāryerthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07bhagvg_u:74: avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā 2.28
GE07bhagvg_u:75: āścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit 2.29
GE07bhagvg_u:76: dehī nityam avadhyoyaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07bhagvg_u:77: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyonyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate 2.31
GE07bhagvg_u:78: yadṛcchayā copapannaṃ svargadvāram apāvṛtam sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam
GE07bhagvg_u:79: atha cet tvam imaṃ dhārmyaṃ saṅgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam
GE07bhagvg_u:80: akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti tevyayām saṃbhāvitasya cākīrtir maraṇād atiricyate 2.34
GE07bhagvg_u:81: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
GE07bhagvg_u:82: avācyavādāṃś ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07bhagvg_u:83: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm tasmād uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:84: sukhaduḥkhe same kṛtvā lābhālābhau jayājayau tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi
GE07bhagvg_u:85: eṣā tebhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi 2.39
GE07bhagvg_u:86: nehābhikramanāśosti pratyavāyo na vidyate svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana bahuśākhā hy anantāś ca buddhayovyavasāyinām 2.41
GE07bhagvg_u:87: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ vedavādaratāḥ pārtha nānyad astīti vādinaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:88: kāmātmānaḥ svargaparā janmakarmaphalapradām kriyāviśeṣabahulāṃ bhogaiśvaryagatiṃ prati 2.43
GE07bhagvg_u:89: bhogaiśvaryaprasaktānāṃ tayāpahṛtacetasām vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate 2.44
GE07bhagvg_u:90: traiguṇyaviṣayā vedā nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna nirdvandvo nityasatvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān
GE07bhagvg_u:91: yāvān artha udapāne sarvataḥ saṃplutodake tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ 2.46
GE07bhagvg_u:92: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgostv akarmaṇi
GE07bhagvg_u:93: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga
GE07bhagvg_u:94: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanañjaya buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:95: buddhiyukto jahātīha ubhe sukṛtaduṣkṛte tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam 2.50
GE07bhagvg_u:96: karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ janmabandhavinirmuktāḥ padaṃ gacchhanty anāmayam
GE07bhagvg_u:97: yadā te mohakalilaṃ buddhir vyatitariṣyati tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca 2.52
GE07bhagvg_u:98: śrutivipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi 2.53
GE07bhagvg_u:99: arjuna uvāca sthitaprajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhisthasya keśava sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim 2.54
GE07bhagvg_u:100: śrībhagavān uvāca prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān ātmany evātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthitaprajñas tadocyate 2.55
GE07bhagvg_u:101: duḥkheṣv anudvignamanāḥ sukheṣu vigataspṛhaḥ vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ sthitadhīr munir ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:102: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tattatprāpya śubhāśubham nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07bhagvg_u:103: yadā saṃharate cāyaṃ kūrmoṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07bhagvg_u:104: viṣayā vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ rasavarjaṃ rasopy asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate 2.59
GE07bhagvg_u:105: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabhaṃ manaḥ 2.60
GE07bhagvg_u:106: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07bhagvg_u:107: dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgas teṣūpajāyate saṅgāt sañjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodhobhijāyate 2.62
GE07bhagvg_u:108: krodhād bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛtivibhramaḥ smṛtibhraṃśād buddhināśo buddhināśāt praṇaśyati
GE07bhagvg_u:109: rāgadveṣavimuktais tu viṣayān indriyaiś caran ātmavaśyair vidheyātmā prasādam adhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:110: prasāde sarvaduḥkhānāṃ hānir asyopajāyate prasannacetaso hy āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate 2.65
GE07bhagvg_u:111: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
GE07bhagvg_u:112: indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan manonuvidhīyate tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi 2.67
GE07bhagvg_u:113: tasmād yasya mahābāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07bhagvg_u:114: yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:115: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī 2.70
GE07bhagvg_u:116: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchhati
GE07bhagvg_u:117: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati sthitvāsyām antakālepi brahmanirvāṇam ṛcchati
GE07bhagvg_u:119: arjuna uvāca jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava 3.1
GE07bhagvg_u:120: vyāmiśreṇeva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyoham āpnuyām 3.2
GE07bhagvg_u:121: śrībhagavān uvāca lokesmin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha jñānayogena sāṅkhyānāṃ karmayogena yoginām 3.3
GE07bhagvg_u:122: na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣośnute na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:123: na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ 3.5
GE07bhagvg_u:124: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:125: yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhaterjuna karmaindriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate
GE07bhagvg_u:126: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:127: yajñārthāt karmaṇonyatra lokoyaṃ karmabandhanaḥ tadarthaṃ karma kaunteya muktasaṅgaḥ samācara
GE07bhagvg_u:128: sahayajñāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purovāca prajāpatiḥ anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vostv iṣṭakāmadhuk
GE07bhagvg_u:129: devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ parasparaṃ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:130: yajñaśiṣṭāśinaḥ santo mucyante sarvakilbiṣaiḥ bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt
GE07bhagvg_u:131: annād bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyād annasaṃbhavaḥ yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ karma brahmodbhavaṃ viddhi brahmākṣarasamudbhavam tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07bhagvg_u:132: evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakraṃ nānuvartayatīha yaḥ aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati 3.16
GE07bhagvg_u:133: yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaścid arthavyapāśrayaḥ 3.18
GE07bhagvg_u:134: tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ 3.19
GE07bhagvg_u:135: karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ lokasaṃgraham evāpi saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi 3.20
GE07bhagvg_u:136: yadyad ācarati śreṣṭhas tattad evetaro janaḥ sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate 3.21
GE07bhagvg_u:137: na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi
GE07bhagvg_u:138: yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:139: saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata kuryād vidvāṃs tathāsaktaś cikīrṣur lokasaṃgraham na buddhibhedaṃ janayed ajñānāṃ karmasaṃginām joṣayet sarvakarmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran
GE07bhagvg_u:140: prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ ahaṃkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate 3.27
GE07bhagvg_u:141: tattvavit tu mahābāho guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate 3.28
GE07bhagvg_u:142: prakṛter guṇasaṃmūḍhāḥ sajjante guṇakarmasu tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet
GE07bhagvg_u:143: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasyādhyātmacetasā nirāśīr nirmamo bhūtvā yudhyasva vigatajvaraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:144: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ śraddhāvantonasūyanto mucyante tepi karmabhiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:145: ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam sarvajñānavimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:146: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07bhagvg_u:147: indriyasyendriyasyārthe rāgadveṣau vyavasthitau tayor na vaśam āgacchhet tau hy asya paripanthinau śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt svadharme nidhanaṃ śreyaḥ paradharmo bhayāvahaḥ arjuna uvāca atha kena prayuktoyaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:148: śrībhagavān uvāca kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam 3.37
GE07bhagvg_u:149: dhūmenāvriyate vanhir yathādarśo malena ca yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedam āvṛtam 3.38
GE07bhagvg_u:150: āvṛtaṃ jñānam etena jñānino nityavairiṇā kāmarupeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇānalena ca 3.39
GE07bhagvg_u:151: indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānam ucyate etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam 3.40
GE07bhagvg_u:152: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha pāpmānaṃ prajahi hy enaṃ jñānavijñānanāśanam
GE07bhagvg_u:153: indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:154: evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam
GE07bhagvg_u:157: śrībhagavān uvāca imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam vivasvān manave prāha manur ikṣvākavebravīt 4.1
GE07bhagvg_u:158: evaṃ paramparāprāptam imaṃ rājarṣayo viduḥ sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa 4.2
GE07bhagvg_u:159: sa evāyaṃ mayā tedya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ bhaktosi me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07bhagvg_u:160: arjuna uvāca aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti 4.4
GE07bhagvg_u:161: śrībhagavānuvāca bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha
GE07bhagvg_u:162: ajopi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaropi san prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmy ātmamāyayā yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham
GE07bhagvg_u:163: paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṃ vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya saṃbhavāmi yuge yuge 4.8
GE07bhagvg_u:164: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti sorjuna
GE07bhagvg_u:165: vītarāgabhayakrodhā manmayā mām upāśritāḥ bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvam āgatāḥ 4.10
GE07bhagvg_u:166: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ 4.11
GE07bhagvg_u:167: kāṃkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā
GE07bhagvg_u:168: cāturvarṇyaṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ guṇakarmavibhāgaśaḥ tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā iti māṃ yobhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate
GE07bhagvg_u:169: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam 4.15
GE07bhagvg_u:170: kiṃ karma kimakarmeti kavayopy atra mohitāḥ tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyaseśubhāt
GE07bhagvg_u:171: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ 4.17
GE07bhagvg_u:172: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
GE07bhagvg_u:173: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṃkalpavarjitāḥ jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:174: tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ karmaṇy abhipravṛttopi naiva kiṃcit karoti saḥ 4.20
GE07bhagvg_u:175: nirāśīr yatacittātmā tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam 4.21
GE07bhagvg_u:176: yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭo dvandvātīto vimatsaraḥ samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate
GE07bhagvg_u:177: gatasaṅgasya muktasya jñānāvasthitacetasaḥ yajñāyācarataḥ karma samagraṃ pravilīyate 4.23
GE07bhagvg_u:178: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma havir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam brahmaiva tena gantavyaṃ brahmakarmasamādhinā daivam evāpare yajñaṃ yoginaḥ paryupāsate brahmāgnāv apare yajñaṃ yajñenaivopajuvhati 4.25
GE07bhagvg_u:179: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juvhati śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juvhati 4.26
GE07bhagvg_u:180: sarvāṇīndriyakarmāṇi prāṇakarmāṇi cāpare ātmasaṃyamayogāgnau juvhati jñānadīpite 4.27
GE07bhagvg_u:181: dravyayajñās tapoyajñā yogayajñās tathāpare svādhyāyajñānayajñāś ca yatayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:182: apāne juvhati prāṇaṃ prāṇepānaṃ tathāpare prāṇāpānagatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇāḥ 4.29
GE07bhagvg_u:183: apare niyatāhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juvhati sarvepy ete yajñavido yajñakṣapitakalmaṣāḥ 4.30
GE07bhagvg_u:184: yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtabhujo yānti brahma sanātanam nāyaṃ lokosty ayajñasya kutonyaḥ kurusattama 4.31
GE07bhagvg_u:185: evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase
GE07bhagvg_u:186: śreyān dravyamayād yajñāj jñānayajñaḥ paraṃtapa sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate
GE07bhagvg_u:187: tad viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā upadekṣyanti te jñānaṃ jñāninas tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:188: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho
GE07bhagvg_u:189: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyasi
GE07bhagvg_u:190: yathaidhāṃsi samiddhognir bhasmasāt kuruterjuna jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā
GE07bhagvg_u:191: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate tat svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālenātmani vindati 4.38
GE07bhagvg_u:192: śraddhāvāṃl labhate jñānaṃ tatparaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śāntim acireṇādhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:193: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati nāyaṃ lokosti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:194: yogasaṃnyastakarmāṇaṃ jñānasaṃchinnasaṃśayam ātmavantaṃ na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhagvg_u:195: tasmād ajñānasañbhūtaṃ hṛtsthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha
GE07bhagvg_u:197: arjuna uvāca saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam 5.1
GE07bhagvg_u:198: śrībhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsaḥ karmayogaś ca niḥśreyasakarāv ubhau tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate 5.2
GE07bhagvg_u:199: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati nirdvandvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:200: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate
GE07bhagvg_u:201: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati 5.5
GE07bhagvg_u:202: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ yogayukto munir brahma nacireṇādhigacchati 5.6
GE07bhagvg_u:203: yogayukto viśuddhātmā vijitātmā jitendriyaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā kurvann api na lipyate 5.7
GE07bhagvg_u:204: naiva kiṃcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan 5.8
GE07bhagvg_u:205: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan
GE07bhagvg_u:206: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07bhagvg_u:207: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm ayuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale sakto nibadhyate
GE07bhagvg_u:208: sarvakarmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste sukhaṃ vaśī navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan 5.13
GE07bhagvg_u:209: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ na karmaphalasaṃyogaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartate
GE07bhagvg_u:210: nādatte kasyacit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:211: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ teṣām ādityavaj jñānaṃ prakāśayati tat param
GE07bhagvg_u:212: tadbuddhayas tadātmānas tanniṣṭhās tatparāyaṇāḥ gacchanty apunarāvṛttiṃ jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:213: vidyāvinayasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ 5.18
GE07bhagvg_u:214: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ 5.19
GE07bhagvg_u:215: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam sthirabuddhir asaṃmūḍho brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ 5.20
GE07bhagvg_u:216: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham sa brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute
GE07bhagvg_u:217: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ 5.22
GE07bhagvg_u:218: śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:219: yontaḥsukhontarārāmas tathāntarjyotir eva yaḥ sa yogī brahmanirvāṇaṃ brahmabhūtodhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:220: labhante brahmanirvāṇam ṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ chinnadvaidhā yatātmānaḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:221: kāmakrodhaviyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatacetasām abhito brahmanirvāṇaṃ vartate viditātmanām 5.26
GE07bhagvg_u:222: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ prāṇāpānau samau kṛtvā nāsābhyantaracāriṇau
GE07bhagvg_u:223: yatendriyamanobuddhirmunir mokṣaparāyaṇaḥ vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ 5.28
GE07bhagvg_u:224: bhoktāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
GE07bhagvg_u:226: śrībhagavān uvāca anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ 6.1
GE07bhagvg_u:227: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana
GE07bhagvg_u:228: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate 6.3
GE07bhagvg_u:229: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate sarvasaṃkalpasaṃnyāsī yogārūḍhas tadocyate 6.4
GE07bhagvg_u:230: uddhared ātmanātmānaṃ nātmānam avasādayet ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ bandhur ātmātmanas tasya yenātmaivātmanā jitaḥ anātmanas tu śatrutve vartetātmaiva śatruvat
GE07bhagvg_u:231: jitātmanaḥ praśāntasya paramātmā samāhitaḥ śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu tathā mānāpamānayoḥ 6.7
GE07bhagvg_u:232: jñānavijñānatṛptātmā kūṭastho vijitendriyaḥ yukta ity ucyate yogī samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ 6.8
GE07bhagvg_u:233: suhṛnmitrāryudāsīnamadhyasthadveṣyabandhuṣu sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate 6.9
GE07bhagvg_u:234: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ ekākī yatacittātmā nirāśīr aparigrahaḥ 6.10
GE07bhagvg_u:235: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ cailājinakuśottaram
GE07bhagvg_u:236: tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yatacittendriyakriyaḥ upaviśyāsane yuñjyād yogam ātmaviśuddhaye 6.12
GE07bhagvg_u:237: samaṃ kāyaśirogrīvaṃ dhārayann acalaṃ sthiraḥ saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaś cānavalokayan praśāntātmā vigatabhīr brahmacārivrate sthitaḥ manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:238: yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī niyatamānasaḥ śāntiṃ nirvāṇaparamāṃ matsaṃsthām adhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:239: nātyaśnatas tu yogosti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ na cātisvapnaśīlasya jāgrato naiva cārjuna 6.16
GE07bhagvg_u:240: yuktāhāravihārasya yuktaceṣṭasya karmasu yuktasvapnāvabodhasya yogo bhavati duḥkhahā 6.17
GE07bhagvg_u:241: yadā viniyataṃ cittam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā 6.18
GE07bhagvg_u:242: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā yogino yatacittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ 6.19
GE07bhagvg_u:243: yatroparamate cittaṃ niruddhaṃ yogasevayā yatra caivātmanātmānaṃ paśyann ātmani tuṣyati 6.20
GE07bhagvg_u:244: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ 6.21
GE07bhagvg_u:245: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
GE07bhagvg_u:246: taṃ vidyād.h duḥkhasaṃyogaviyogaṃ yogasaṃjñitam sa niścayena yoktavyo yogonirviṇṇacetasā
GE07bhagvg_u:247: saṅkalpaprabhavān kāmāṃs tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣataḥ manasaivendriyagrāmaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:248: śanaiḥ śanair uparamed buddhyā dhṛtigṛhītayā ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet
GE07bhagvg_u:249: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07bhagvg_u:250: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam upaiti śāntarajasaṃ brahmabhūtam akalmaṣam
GE07bhagvg_u:251: yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī vigatakalmaṣaḥ sukhena brahmasaṃsparśam atyantaṃ sukham aśnute sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani īkṣate yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ 6.29
GE07bhagvg_u:252: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07bhagvg_u:253: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ sarvathā vartamānopi sa yogī mayi vartate
GE07bhagvg_u:254: ātmaupamyena sarvatra samaṃ paśyati yorjuna sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:255: arjuna uvāca yoyaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
GE07bhagvg_u:256: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
GE07bhagvg_u:257: śrībhagavān uvāca asañśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate 6.35
GE07bhagvg_u:258: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ vaśyātmanā tu yatatā śakyovāptum upāyataḥ 6.36
GE07bhagvg_u:259: arjuna uvāca ayatiḥ śraddhayopeto yogāc calitamānasaḥ aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa
GE07bhagvg_u:260: kacchin nobhayavibhraṣṭaś chinnābhram iva naśyati apratiṣṭho mahābāho vimūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi
GE07bhagvg_u:261: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ tvadanyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
GE07bhagvg_u:262: śrībhagavān uvāca pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaścid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati 6.40
GE07bhagvg_u:263: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭobhijāyate 6.41
GE07bhagvg_u:264: athavā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam 6.42
GE07bhagvg_u:265: tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07bhagvg_u:266: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśopi saḥ jijñāsur api yogasya śabdabrahmātivartate 6.44
GE07bhagvg_u:267: prayatnād yatamānas tu yogī saṃśuddhakilbiṣaḥ anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gatim 6.45
GE07bhagvg_u:268: tapasvibhyodhiko yogī jñānibhyopi matodhikaḥ karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GE07bhagvg_u:269: yoginām api sarveṣāṃ madgatenāntarātmanā śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:271: śrībhagavān uvāca mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
GE07bhagvg_u:272: jñānaṃ tehaṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo.anyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
GE07bhagvg_u:273: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid yatati siddhaye yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaścin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:274: bhūmir āponalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā 7.4
GE07bhagvg_u:275: apareyam itas tvanyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām jīvabhūtāṃ mahābāho yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat
GE07bhagvg_u:276: etadyonīni bhūtāni sarvāṇīty upadhāraya ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā 7.6
GE07bhagvg_u:277: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid asti dhanaṃjaya mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07bhagvg_u:278: raso.aham apsu kaunteya prabhāsmi śaśisūryayoḥ praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
GE07bhagvg_u:279: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau jīvanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu
GE07bhagvg_u:280: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām
GE07bhagvg_u:281: balaṃ balavatāṃ cāhaṃ kāmarāgavivarjitam dharmāviruddho bhūteṣu kāmo.asmi bharatarṣabha
GE07bhagvg_u:282: ye caiva sātvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
GE07bhagvg_u:283: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
GE07bhagvg_u:284: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te 7.14
GE07bhagvg_u:285: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ māyayāpahṛtajñānā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ 7.15
GE07bhagvg_u:286: caturvidhā bhajante māṃ janāḥ sukṛtinorjuna ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
GE07bhagvg_u:287: teṣāṃ jñānī nityayukta ekabhaktir viśiṣyate priyo hi jñāninotyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:288: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:289: kāmais tais tair hṛtajñānāḥ prapadyantenyadevatāḥ taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:290: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy
GE07bhagvg_u:291: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaivaḥ vihitān hi tān
GE07bhagvg_u:292: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api 7.23
GE07bhagvg_u:293: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mamāvyayam anuttamam
GE07bhagvg_u:294: nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yogamāyāsamāvṛtaḥ mūḍhoyaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam 7.25
GE07bhagvg_u:295: vedāhaṃ samatītāni vartamānāni cārjuna bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaścana 7.26
GE07bhagvg_u:296: icchādveṣasamutthena dvandvamohena bhārata sarvabhūtāni saṃmohaṃ sarge yānti paraṃtapa 7.27
GE07bhagvg_u:297: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām te dvandvamohanirmuktā bhajante māṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ jarāmaraṇamokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhagvg_u:298: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ prayāṇakālepi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:300: arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:301: adhiyajñaḥ kathaṃ kotra dehesmin madhusūdana prayāṇakāle ca kathaṃ jñeyosi niyatātmabhiḥ 8.2
GE07bhagvg_u:302: śrībhagavān uvāca akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvodhyātmam ucyate bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ 8.3
GE07bhagvg_u:303: adhibhūtaṃ kṣaro bhāvaḥ puruṣaś cādhidaivatam adhiyajñoham evātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara 8.4
GE07bhagvg_u:304: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:305: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:306: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca mayy arpitamanobuddhir mām evaiṣyasy asaṃśayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:307: abhyāsayogayuktena cetasā nānyagāminā paramaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ yāti pārthānucintayan 8.8
GE07bhagvg_u:308: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāraṃ aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpaṃ ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt 8.9
GE07bhagvg_u:309: prayāṇakāle manasācalena bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam 8.10
GE07bhagvg_u:310: yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye 8.11
GE07bhagvg_u:311: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca mūrdhny ādhāyātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthito yogadhāraṇām
GE07bhagvg_u:312: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:313: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ pārtha nityayuktasya yoginaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:314: mām upetya punarjanma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam nāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ ā brahmabhuvanāl lokāḥ punarāvartinorjuna mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate 8.16
GE07bhagvg_u:315: sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥ rātriṃ yugasahasrāntāṃ te.ahorātravido janāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:316: avyaktād vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanty aharāgame rātryāgame pralīyante tatraivāvyaktasaṃjñake
GE07bhagvg_u:317: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate rātryāgamevaśaḥ pārtha prabhavaty aharāgame
GE07bhagvg_u:318: paras tasmāt tu bhāvonyovyaktovyaktāt sanātanaḥ yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
GE07bhagvg_u:319: avyaktokṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07bhagvg_u:320: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam 8.22
GE07bhagvg_u:321: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07bhagvg_u:322: agnir jotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:323: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
GE07bhagvg_u:324: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate ekayā yāty anāvṛttim anyayāvartate punaḥ 8.26
GE07bhagvg_u:325: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yogayukto bhavārjuna 8.27
GE07bhagvg_u:326: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam 8.28
GE07bhagvg_u:328: śrībhagavān uvāca idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave jñānaṃ vijñānasahitaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyaseśubhāt 9.1
GE07bhagvg_u:329: rājavidyā rājaguhyaṃ pavitram idam uttamam pratyakṣāvagamaṃ dharmyaṃ susukhaṃ kartum avyayam
GE07bhagvg_u:330: aśraddadhānāḥ puruṣā dharmasyāsya paraṃtapa aprāpya māṃ nivartante mṛtyusaṃsāravartmani 9.3
GE07bhagvg_u:331: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:332: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:333: yathākāśasthito nityaṃ vāyuḥ sarvatrago mahān tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni matsthānīty upadhāraya
GE07bhagvg_u:334: sarvabhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ yānti māmikām kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham
GE07bhagvg_u:335: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt
GE07bhagvg_u:336: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya udāsīnavad āsīnam asaktaṃ teṣu karmasu 9.9
GE07bhagvg_u:337: mayādhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram hetunānena kaunteya jagad viparivartate 9.10
GE07bhagvg_u:338: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mama bhūtamaheśvaram 9.11
GE07bhagvg_u:339: moghāśā moghakarmāṇo moghajñānā vicetasaḥ rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ 9.12
GE07bhagvg_u:340: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ bhajanty ananyamanaso jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam
GE07bhagvg_u:341: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
GE07bhagvg_u:342: jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate ekatvena pṛthaktvena bahudhā viśvatomukham 9.15
GE07bhagvg_u:343: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
GE07bhagvg_u:344: mantro.aham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
GE07bhagvg_u:345: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca 9.17
GE07bhagvg_u:346: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam
GE07bhagvg_u:347: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛṇhāmy utsṛjāmi ca amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
GE07bhagvg_u:348: traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā yajñair iṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante te puṇyam āsādya surendralokaṃ aśnanti divyān divi devabhogān 9.20
GE07bhagvg_u:349: te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti evaṃ trayīdharmam anuprapannā gatāgataṃ kāmakāmā labhante 9.21
GE07bhagvg_u:350: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yogakṣemaṃ vahāmy aham yepy anyadevatābhaktā yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ tepi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
GE07bhagvg_u:351: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te 9.24
GE07bhagvg_u:352: yānti devavratā devān pitṛn yānti pitṛvratāḥ bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājinopi mām
GE07bhagvg_u:353: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
GE07bhagvg_u:354: śubhāśubhaphalair evaṃ mokṣyase karmabandhanaiḥ saṃnyāsayogayuktātmā vimukto mām upaiṣyasi
GE07bhagvg_u:355: samohaṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyosti na priyaḥ ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham 9.29
GE07bhagvg_u:356: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ nigacchhati kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07bhagvg_u:357: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya yepi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās tepi yānti parāṃ
GE07bhagvg_u:358: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām 9.33
GE07bhagvg_u:359: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru mām evaiṣyasi yuktvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ X. atha daśamodhyāyaḥ. (vibhūtiyogaḥ)
GE07bhagvg_u:360: śrībhagavānuvāca bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ yat tehaṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā
GE07bhagvg_u:361: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:362: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:363: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavobhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca 10.4
GE07bhagvg_u:364: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśoyaśaḥ bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:365: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ 10.6
GE07bhagvg_u:366: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ sovikampena yogena yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ 10.7
GE07bhagvg_u:367: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:368: maccittā madgataprāṇā bodhayantaḥ parasparam kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti
GE07bhagvg_u:369: teṣāṃ satatayuktānāṃ bhajatāṃ prītipūrvakam dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te teṣām evānukampārtham aham ajñānajaṃ tamaḥ nāśayāmy ātmabhāvastho jñānadīpena bhāsvatā 10.11
GE07bhagvg_u:370: arjuna uvāca paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07bhagvg_u:371: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
GE07bhagvg_u:372: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:373: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ vettha tvaṃ puruṣottama bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagatpate 10.15
GE07bhagvg_u:374: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07bhagvg_u:375: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyosi bhagavan mayā
GE07bhagvg_u:376: vistareṇātmano yogaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca janārdana bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti memṛtam
GE07bhagvg_u:377: śrībhagavān uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
GE07bhagvg_u:378: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca
GE07bhagvg_u:379: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī 10.21
GE07bhagvg_u:380: vedānāṃ sāmavedosmi devānām asmi vāsavaḥ indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā 10.22
GE07bhagvg_u:381: rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaraś cāsmi vitteśo yakṣarakṣasām vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
GE07bhagvg_u:382: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:383: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram yajñānāṃ japayajñosmi sthāvarāṇāṃ himālayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:384: aśvatthaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ gandharvāṇāṃ citrarathaḥ siddhānāṃ kapilo muniḥ uccaiḥśravasam aśvānāṃ viddhi mām amṛtodbhavam airāvataṃ gajendrāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca narādhipam
GE07bhagvg_u:385: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:386: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham pitṛṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
GE07bhagvg_u:387: pralhādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendrohaṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07bhagvg_u:388: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi strotasām asmi jāhnavī
GE07bhagvg_u:389: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ vādaḥ pravadatām aham
GE07bhagvg_u:390: akṣarāṇām akārosmi dvandvaḥ sāmāsikasya ca aham evākṣayaḥ kālo dhātāhaṃ viśvatomukhaḥ 10.33
GE07bhagvg_u:391: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:392: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham māsānāṃ mārgaśīrṣoham ṛtūnāṃ kusumākaraḥ 10.35
GE07bhagvg_u:393: dyutaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham jayosmi vyavasāyosmi sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevosmi pāṇḍavānāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ 10.37
GE07bhagvg_u:394: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
GE07bhagvg_u:395: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
GE07bhagvg_u:396: nāntosti mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnāṃ paraṃtapa eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā 10.40
GE07bhagvg_u:397: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
GE07bhagvg_u:398: athavā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
GE07bhagvg_u:400: arjuna uvāca madanugrahāya paramaṃ guhyam adhyātmasaṃjñitam yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena mohoyaṃ vigato mama 11.1
GE07bhagvg_u:401: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā tvattaḥ kamalapatrākṣa māhātmyam api cāvyayam evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07bhagvg_u:402: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
GE07bhagvg_u:403: śrībhagavān uvāca paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśotha sahastraśaḥ nānāvidhāni divyāni nānāvarṇākṛtīni ca 11.5
GE07bhagvg_u:404: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā bahūny adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi paśyāścaryāṇi bhārata
GE07bhagvg_u:405: ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sacarācaram mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
GE07bhagvg_u:406: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07bhagvg_u:407: sañjaya uvāca evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram 11.9
GE07bhagvg_u:409: divyamālyāmbaradharaṃ divyagandhānulepanam sarvāścaryamayaṃ devam anantaṃ viśvatomukham
GE07bhagvg_u:410: divi sūryasahastrasya bhaved yugapad utthitā yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ tatraikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā apaśyad devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavas tadā
GE07bhagvg_u:411: tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo hṛṣṭaromā dhanaṃjayaḥ praṇamya śirasā devaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata 11.14
GE07bhagvg_u:412: arjuna uvāca paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān
GE07bhagvg_u:413: brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanasthaṃ ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān 11.15
GE07bhagvg_u:414: anekabāhūdaravaktranetraṃ paśyāmi tvāṃ sarvatonantarūpam nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa 11.16
GE07bhagvg_u:415: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantād dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam 11.17
GE07bhagvg_u:416: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me 11.18
GE07bhagvg_u:417: anādimadhyāntam anantavīryam anantabāhuṃ śaśisūryanetram paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ
GE07bhagvg_u:419: dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rupam ugraṃ tavedaṃ lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman 11.20
GE07bhagvg_u:420: amī hi tvāṃ surasaṃghā viśanti kecid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṃghāḥ stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ 11.21
GE07bhagvg_u:421: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā viśveśvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghā vīkṣante tvāṃ vismitāś caiva sarve 11.22
GE07bhagvg_u:422: rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam bahūdaraṃ bahudañṣṭrākarālaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham 11.23
GE07bhagvg_u:423: nabhaḥspṛśaṃ dīptam anekavarṇaṃ vyāttānanaṃ dīptaviśālanetram dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo 11.24
GE07bhagvg_u:424: daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasaṃnibhāni diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa 11.25
GE07bhagvg_u:425: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṃghaiḥ bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ 11.26
GE07bhagvg_u:426: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni kecid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ 11.27
GE07bhagvg_u:427: yathā nadīnāṃ bahavombuvegāḥ samudram evābhimukhā dravanti tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti 11.28
GE07bhagvg_u:428: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṅgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ 11.29
GE07bhagvg_u:429: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo 11.30
GE07bhagvg_u:430: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo namostu te devavara prasīda vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim 11.31
GE07bhagvg_u:431: śrībhagavān uvāca kālosmi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ ṛtepi tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti sarve yevasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ 11.32
GE07bhagvg_u:432: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin 11.33
GE07bhagvg_u:433: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhavīrān mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān 11.34
GE07bhagvg_u:434: sañjaya uvāca etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya 11.35
GE07bhagvg_u:435: arjuna uvāca sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ 11.36
GE07bhagvg_u:436: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman garīyase brahmaṇopy ādikartre ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat 11.37
GE07bhagvg_u:437: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa 11.38
GE07bhagvg_u:438: vāyur yamognir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca namo namas testu sahastrakṛtvaḥ punaś ca bhūyopi namo namas te 11.39
GE07bhagvg_u:439: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te namostu te sarvata eva sarva anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tatosi sarvaḥ 11.40
GE07bhagvg_u:440: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi 11.41
GE07bhagvg_u:441: yac cāvahāsārtham asatkṛtosi vihāraśayyāsanabhojaneṣu ekothavāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam 11.42
GE07bhagvg_u:442: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān na tvatsamosty abhyadhikaḥ kutonyo lokatrayepy apratimaprabhāva 11.43
GE07bhagvg_u:443: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum 11.44
GE07bhagvg_u:444: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣitosmi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa 11.45
GE07bhagvg_u:445: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastaṃ icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena sahastrabāho bhava viśvamūrte 11.46
GE07bhagvg_u:446: śrībhagavān uvāca mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ yan me tvadanyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam 11.47
GE07bhagvg_u:447: na veda yajñādhyayanair na dānaiḥ na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke draṣṭuṃ tvadanyena kurupravīra 11.48
GE07bhagvg_u:448: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya 11.49
GE07bhagvg_u:449: sañjaya uvāca ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā 11.50
GE07bhagvg_u:450: arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ 11.51
GE07bhagvg_u:451: śrībhagavān uvāca sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvān asi yan mama devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 11.52
GE07bhagvg_u:452: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
GE07bhagvg_u:453: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidhorjuna jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07bhagvg_u:454: matkarmakṛn matparamo madbhaktaḥ saṅgavarjitaḥ nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
GE07bhagvg_u:456: arjuna uvāca evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke
GE07bhagvg_u:457: śrībhagavān uvāca mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate śraddhayā parayopetāḥ te me yuktatamā matāḥ 12.2
GE07bhagvg_u:458: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyaṃ avyaktaṃ paryupāsate sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭasthaṃ acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07bhagvg_u:459: saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ sarvatra samabuddhayāḥ te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:460: kleśodhikataras teṣāṃ avyaktāsaktacetasām avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate 12.5
GE07bhagvg_u:461: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparaḥ ananyenaiva yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate 12.6
GE07bhagvg_u:462: teṣāṃ ahaṃ samuddhartā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgarāt bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśitacetasām 12.7
GE07bhagvg_u:463: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:464: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram abhyāsayogena tato mām ichāptuṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhagvg_u:465: abhyāsepy asamarthosi matkarmaparamo bhava madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07bhagvg_u:466: athaitad apy aśaktosi kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ tataḥ kuru yatātmavān
GE07bhagvg_u:467: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate dhyānāt karmaphalatyāgas tyāgāc chāntir
GE07bhagvg_u:468: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī
GE07bhagvg_u:469: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ yogī yatātmā dṛḍhaniścayaḥ mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:470: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ anapekṣaḥ śucir dakṣa udāsīno gatavyathaḥ sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:471: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:472: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu samaḥ saṅgavivarjitaḥ 12.18
GE07bhagvg_u:473: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kenacit aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:474: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās tetīva me priyāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:477: arjuna uvāca prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca etad veditum icchāmi jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca keśava 13.1
GE07bhagvg_u:478: śrībhagavān uvāca idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ 13.2
GE07bhagvg_u:479: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama 13.3
GE07bhagvg_u:480: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu 13.4
GE07bhagvg_u:481: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak brahmasūtrapadaiś caiva hetumadbhir viniścitaiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:482: mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca pañca cendriyagocarāḥ 13.6
GE07bhagvg_u:483: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ etat kṣetraṃ samāsena savikāram udāhṛtam
GE07bhagvg_u:484: amānitvam adambhitvam ahiṃsā kṣāntir ārjavam ācāryopāsanaṃ śaucaṃ sthairyam ātmavinigrahaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:485: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam anahaṃkāra eva ca janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanam 13.9
GE07bhagvg_u:486: asaktir anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu nityaṃ ca samacittatvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu 13.10
GE07bhagvg_u:487: mayi cānanyayogena bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī viviktadeśasevitvam aratir janasaṃsadi 13.11
GE07bhagvg_u:488: adhyātmajñānanityatvaṃ tattvajñānārthadarśanam etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad atonyathā
GE07bhagvg_u:489: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:490: sarvataḥ pāṇipādaṃ tat sarvatokṣiśiromukham sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE07bhagvg_u:491: sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
GE07bhagvg_u:492: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca
GE07bhagvg_u:493: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca 13.17
GE07bhagvg_u:494: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
GE07bhagvg_u:495: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ sanāsataḥ madbhakta etad vijñāya madbhāvāyopapadyate
GE07bhagvg_u:496: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādi ubhāv api vikārāñś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
GE07bhagvg_u:497: kārya kāraṇa kartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgosya sadasadyonijanmasu 13.22
GE07bhagvg_u:498: upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ paramātmeti cāpyukto dehesmin puruṣaḥ paraḥ 13.23
GE07bhagvg_u:499: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha sarvathā vartamānopi na sa bhūyobhijāyate 13.24
GE07bhagvg_u:500: dhyānenātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā anye sāṃkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare 13.25
GE07bhagvg_u:501: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate tepi cātitaranty eva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ 13.26
GE07bhagvg_u:502: yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃcit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam kṣetrakṣetrajñasaṃyogāt tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
GE07bhagvg_u:503: samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaram vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07bhagvg_u:504: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:505: prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśaḥ yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati 13.30
GE07bhagvg_u:506: yadā bhūtapṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā 13.31
GE07bhagvg_u:507: anāditvān nirguṇatvāt paramātmāyam avyayaḥ śarīrasthopi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate 13.32
GE07bhagvg_u:508: yathā sarvagataṃ saukṣmyād ākāśaṃ nopalipyate sarvatrāvasthito dehe tathātmā nopalipyate 13.33
GE07bhagvg_u:509: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata
GE07bhagvg_u:510: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ jñānacakṣuṣā bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param
GE07bhagvg_u:513: śrībhagavān uvāca paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:514: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ sargepi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca 14.2
GE07bhagvg_u:515: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham saṃbhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata
GE07bhagvg_u:516: sarvayoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā
GE07bhagvg_u:517: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisambhavāḥ nibadhnanti mahābāho dehe dehinam avyayam 14.5
GE07bhagvg_u:518: tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt prakāśakam anāmayam sukhasaṅgena badhnāti jñānasaṅgena cānagha 14.6
GE07bhagvg_u:519: rajo rāgātmakaṃ viddhi tṛṣṇāsaṅgasamudbhavam tan nibadhnāti kaunteya karmasaṅgena dehinam
GE07bhagvg_u:520: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām pramādālasyanidrābhis tan nibadhnāti bhārata
GE07bhagvg_u:521: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde saṃjayaty uta
GE07bhagvg_u:522: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā 14.10
GE07bhagvg_u:523: sarvadvāreṣu dehesmin prakāśa upajāyate jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta
GE07bhagvg_u:524: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā rajasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharatarṣabha
GE07bhagvg_u:525: aprakāśopravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca tamasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kurunandana 14.13
GE07bhagvg_u:526: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt tadottamavidāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyate 14.14
GE07bhagvg_u:527: rajasi pralayaṃ gatvā karmasaṅgiṣu jāyate tathā pralīnas tamasi mūḍhayoniṣu jāyate 14.15
GE07bhagvg_u:528: karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:529: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca pramādamohau tamaso bhavatojñānam eva ca 14.17
GE07bhagvg_u:530: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ jaghanyaguṇavṛttisthā adho gacchhanti tāmasāḥ 14.18
GE07bhagvg_u:531: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭānupaśyati guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ sodhigacchhati
GE07bhagvg_u:532: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhair vimuktomṛtam aśnute 14.20
GE07bhagvg_u:533: arjuna uvāca kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate 14.21
GE07bhagvg_u:534: śrībhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava ta dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati 14.22
GE07bhagvg_u:535: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate guṇā vartanta ity eva yovatiṣṭhati neṅgate 14.23
GE07bhagvg_u:536: samaduḥkhasukhaḥ svasthaḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ tulyapriyāpriyo dhīras tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:537: mānāpamānayos tulyas tulyo mitrāripakṣayoḥ sarvārambhaparityāgī guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate 14.25
GE07bhagvg_u:538: māṃ ca yovyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate 14.26
GE07bhagvg_u:539: brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham amṛtasyāvyayasya ca śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca
GE07bhagvg_u:541: śrībhagavān uvāca ūrdhvamūlam adhaḥśākham aśvatthaṃ prāhur avyam chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit 15.1
GE07bhagvg_u:542: adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtāstasya śākhā guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke 15.2
GE07bhagvg_u:543: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlaṃ asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā 15.3
GE07bhagvg_u:544: tataḥ padaṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ tameva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī 15.4
GE07bhagvg_u:545: nirmānamohā jitasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmanityā vinivṛttakāmāḥ dvandvair vimuktāḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñaiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:547: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ manaḥṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi prakṛtisthāni karṣati 15.7
GE07bhagvg_u:548: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ gṛhitvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt
GE07bhagvg_u:549: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca adhiṣṭhāya manaś cāyaṃ viṣayān upasevate
GE07bhagvg_u:550: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:551: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam yatantopy akṛtātmāno nainaṃ paśyanty acetasaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:552: yad ādityagataṃ tejo jagad bhāsayatekhilam yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:553: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ prāṇāpānasamāyuktaḥ pacāmy annaṃ caturvidham
GE07bhagvg_u:554: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham 15.15
GE07bhagvg_u:555: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthokṣara ucyate 15.16
GE07bhagvg_u:556: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:557: yasmāt kṣaram atītoham akṣarād api cottamaḥ atosmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ 15.18
GE07bhagvg_u:558: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata 15.19
GE07bhagvg_u:559: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata
GE07bhagvg_u:562: śrībhagavān uvāca abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam 16.1
GE07bhagvg_u:563: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07bhagvg_u:564: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata 16.3
GE07bhagvg_u:565: dambho darpobhimānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm
GE07bhagvg_u:566: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātosi pāṇḍava 16.5
GE07bhagvg_u:567: dvau bhūtasargau lokesmin daiva āsura eva ca daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
GE07bhagvg_u:568: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
GE07bhagvg_u:569: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram aparasparasaṃbhūtaṃ kim anyat kāmahaitukam 16.8
GE07bhagvg_u:570: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭātmānolpabuddhayaḥ prabhavanty ugrakarmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagatohitāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:571: kāmam āśritya duṣpūraṃ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ mohād gṛhītvāsadgrāhān pravartanteśucivratāḥ 16.10
GE07bhagvg_u:572: cintām aparimeyāṃ ca pralayāntām upāśritāḥ kāmopabhogaparamā etāvad iti niścitāḥ 16.11
GE07bhagvg_u:573: āśāpāśaśatair baddhāḥ kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ īhante kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasaṃcayān 16.12
GE07bhagvg_u:574: idam adya mayā labdham imaṃ prāpsye manoratham idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam
GE07bhagvg_u:575: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api
GE07bhagvg_u:576: īśvaro.aham ahaṃ bhogī siddhohaṃ balavān sukhī 16.14
GE07bhagvg_u:577: āḍhyobhijanavān asmi konyosti sadṛśo mayā yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣya ity ajñānavimohitāḥ 16.15
GE07bhagvg_u:578: anekacittavibhrāntā mohajālasamāvṛtāḥ prasaktāḥ kāmabhogeṣu patanti narakeśucau 16.16
GE07bhagvg_u:579: ātmasaṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhā dhanamānamadānvitāḥ yajante nāmayajñais te dambhenāvidhipūrvakam 16.17
GE07bhagvg_u:580: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ mām ātmaparadeheṣu pradviṣantobhyasūyakāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:581: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krurān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu 16.19
GE07bhagvg_u:582: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmanijanmani mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:583: trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet 16.21
GE07bhagvg_u:584: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:585: yaḥ śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
GE07bhagvg_u:586: tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te kāryākāryavyavasthitau jñātvā śāstravidhānoktaṃ karma kartum ihārhasi XVII. atha saptadaśodhyāyaḥ.
GE07bhagvg_u:588: arjuna uvāca ye śāstravidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ 17.1
GE07bhagvg_u:589: śrībhagavān uvāca trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu 17.2
GE07bhagvg_u:590: sattvānurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata śraddhāmayoyaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva
GE07bhagvg_u:591: yajante sāttvikā devān yakṣarakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ pretān bhūtagaṇāñś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:592: aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ dambhāhaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ kāmarāgabalānvitāḥ 17.5
GE07bhagvg_u:593: karṣayantaḥ śarīrasthaṃ bhūtagrāmam acetasaḥ māṃ caivāntaḥśarīrasthaṃ tān viddhy āsuraniścayān
GE07bhagvg_u:594: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ
GE07bhagvg_u:595: āyuḥsattvabalārogyasukhaprītivivardhanāḥ rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:597: yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat ucchiṣṭam api cāmedhyaṃ bhojanaṃ tāmasapriyam aphalāṅkṣibhir yajño vidhidṛṣṭo ya ijyate yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ 17.11
GE07bhagvg_u:598: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07bhagvg_u:599: vidhihīnam asṛṣṭānnaṃ mantrahīnam adakṣiṇam śraddhāvirahitaṃ yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate 17.13
GE07bhagvg_u:600: devadvijaguruprājñapūjanaṃ śaucam ārjavam brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate 17.14
GE07bhagvg_u:601: anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate manaḥprasādaḥ saumyatvaṃ maunam ātmavinigrahaḥ bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:602: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ aphalākāṅkṣibhir yuktaiḥ sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate
GE07bhagvg_u:603: satkāramānapūjārthaṃ tapo dambhena caiva yat kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
GE07bhagvg_u:604: mūḍhagrāheṇātmano yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam 17.19
GE07bhagvg_u:605: dātavyam iti yad dānaṃ dīyatenupakāriṇe deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
GE07bhagvg_u:606: yat tu prattyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam 17.21
GE07bhagvg_u:607: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate asatkṛtam avajñātaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam 17.22
GE07bhagvg_u:608: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā 17.23
GE07bhagvg_u:609: tasmād om ity udāhṛtya yajñadānatapaḥkriyāḥ pravartante vidhānoktāḥ satataṃ brahmavādinām
GE07bhagvg_u:610: tad ity anabhisaṃdhāya phalaṃ yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ dānakriyāś ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
GE07bhagvg_u:611: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
GE07bhagvg_u:612: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat prepya no iha 17.28
GE07bhagvg_u:614: arjuna uvāca saṃnyāsasya mahābāho tattvam icchāmi veditum tyāgasya ca hṛṣīkeśa pṛthak keśiniṣūdana
GE07bhagvg_u:615: śrībhagavān uvāca kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ 18.2
GE07bhagvg_u:616: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyam iti cāpare 18.3
GE07bhagvg_u:617: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama tyāgo hi puruṣavyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:618: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām 18.5
GE07bhagvg_u:619: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
GE07bhagvg_u:620: niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate mohāt tasya parityāgas tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 18.7
GE07bhagvg_u:621: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet 18.8
GE07bhagvg_u:622: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyaterjuna saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ 18.9
GE07bhagvg_u:623: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate tyāgī sattvasamāviṣṭo medhāvī chinnasaṃśayaḥ 18.10
GE07bhagvg_u:624: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
GE07bhagvg_u:625: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit 18.12
GE07bhagvg_u:626: pañcaitāni mahābāho kāraṇāni nibodha me sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
GE07bhagvg_u:627: śarīravāṅmanobhir yat karma prārabhate naraḥ nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:628: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:629: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
GE07bhagvg_u:630: hatvā.api sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate 18.17
GE07bhagvg_u:631: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ parijñātā trividhā karmacodanā karaṇaṃ karma karteti trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny
GE07bhagvg_u:632: sarvabhūteṣu yenaikaṃ bhāvam avyayam īkṣate avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
GE07bhagvg_u:633: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam 18.21
GE07bhagvg_u:634: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahetukam atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07bhagvg_u:635: niyataṃ saṅgarahitam arāgadveṣataḥ kṛtam aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate 18.23
GE07bhagvg_u:636: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ kriyate bahulāyāsaṃ tad rājasam udāhṛtam 18.24
GE07bhagvg_u:637: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:638: muktasaṅgonahaṃvādī dhṛtyutsāhasamanvitaḥ siddhyasiddhyor nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvika ucyate rāgī karmaphalaprepsur lubdho hiṃsātmakośuciḥ harṣaśokānvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 18.27
GE07bhagvg_u:639: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naiṣkṛtikolasaḥ viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
GE07bhagvg_u:640: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu procyamānam aśeṣeṇa pṛthaktvena dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhagvg_u:641: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī 18.30
GE07bhagvg_u:642: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07bhagvg_u:643: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā sarvārthān viparītāñś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07bhagvg_u:644: dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥprāṇendriyakriyāḥ yogenāvyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
GE07bhagvg_u:645: yayā tu dharmakāmārthān dhṛtyā dhārayaterjuna prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07bhagvg_u:646: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07bhagvg_u:647: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchhati
GE07bhagvg_u:648: yat tadagre viṣam iva pariṇāmemṛtopamam tat sukhaṃ sāttvikaṃ proktam ātmabuddhiprasādajam
GE07bhagvg_u:649: viṣayendriyasañyogād yat tad agremṛtopamam pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam 18.38
GE07bhagvg_u:650: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ nidrālasyapramādotthaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07bhagvg_u:651: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ 18.40
GE07bhagvg_u:652: brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāvaprabhavair guṇaiḥ śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca jñānaṃ vijñānam āstikyaṃ brahmakarma svabhāvajam śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣātraṃ karma svabhāvajam
GE07bhagvg_u:653: kṛṣigaurakṣyavāṇijyaṃ vaiśyakarma svabhāvajam paricaryātmakaṃ karma śūdrasyāpi svabhāvajam
GE07bhagvg_u:654: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac
GE07bhagvg_u:655: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:656: śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmot svanuṣṭhitāt svabhāvaniyataṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet sarvārambhā hi doṣeṇa dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ 18.48
GE07bhagvg_u:657: asaktabuddhiḥ sarvatra jitātmā vigataspṛhaḥ naiṣkarmyasiddhiṃ paramāṃ saṃnyāsenādhigacchati
GE07bhagvg_u:658: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā 18.50
GE07bhagvg_u:659: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya
GE07bhagvg_u:660: viviktasevī laghvāśī yatavākkāyamānasaḥ dhyānayogaparo nityaṃ vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:661: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham vimucya nirmamaḥ śānto brahmabhūyāya kalpate
GE07bhagvg_u:662: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām
GE07bhagvg_u:663: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram
GE07bhagvg_u:664: sarvakarmāṇy api sadā kurvāṇo madvyapāśrayaḥ matprasādād avāpnoti śāśvataṃ padam avyayam cetasā sarvakarmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparaḥ buddhiyogam upāśritya maccittaḥ satataṃ bhava maccittaḥ sarvadurgāṇi matprasādat tariṣyasi atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati
GE07bhagvg_u:665: svabhāvajena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśopi
GE07bhagvg_u:666: īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśerjuna tiṣṭhati bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā 18.61
GE07bhagvg_u:667: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam
GE07bhagvg_u:668: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā vimṛśyaitad aśeṣeṇa yathecchasi tathā kuru 18.63
GE07bhagvg_u:669: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ iṣṭosi me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam 18.64
GE07bhagvg_u:670: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyosi me
GE07bhagvg_u:671: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣyayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:672: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadācana na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yobhyasūyati 18.67
GE07bhagvg_u:673: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:674: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priyakṛttamaḥ bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
GE07bhagvg_u:675: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:676: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ sopi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07bhagvg_u:677: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā kaccid ajñānasaṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭas te dhanaṃjaya arjuna uvāca naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta sthitosmi gatasaṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava 18.73
GE07bhagvg_u:678: sañjaya uvāca ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam 18.74
GE07bhagvg_u:679: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
GE07bhagvg_u:680: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:681: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ
GE07bhagvg_u:682: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama 18.78
